attributes.action: Stop lecturing the Great British public on none events such as food waste and sort out the scum on our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Another brave soldier laid to rest and yet another innocent young persons life taken by a knife.  And what is our leaders response?  Don`t waste food.  Come on Mr Brown start leading because it would appear you are living in a different world to the rest of us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
